title: Inception
plotSummary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: The Dark Knight
plotSummary: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Interstellar
plotSummary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity’s survival.

title: Avatar
plotSummary: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Titanic
plotSummary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Godfather
plotSummary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Forrest Gump
plotSummary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: Gladiator
plotSummary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
plotSummary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Pulp Fiction
plotSummary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster’s wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plotSummary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Matrix
plotSummary: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Fight Club
plotSummary: An office worker and a soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

title: The Avengers: Endgame
plotSummary: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the remaining Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos’s actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: Jurassic Park
plotSummary: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaurs to run amok.

title: The Lion King
plotSummary: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his brother, who wants to become king.

title: Back to the Future
plotSummary: Marty McFly, a teenager, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean built by his eccentric friend the scientist.

title: The Prestige
plotSummary: After a tragic accident two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to out-wit each other.

title: The Departed
plotSummary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Massachusetts.

title: Whiplash
plotSummary: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are matched by his teacher’s ruthless approach.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
plotSummary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, two rebels just might be able to restore order.

title: Parasite
plotSummary: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
plotSummary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
plotSummary: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatic from taking control of the universe.

title: The Social Network
plotSummary: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become Facebook.

title: Up
plotSummary: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his flying house with an earnest young Wilderness Explorer named Russell.

title: Coco
plotSummary: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family’s ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to seek forgiveness and fulfill his dreams.

title: Blade Runner 2049
plotSummary: Young Blade Runner K encounters a long-buried secret that leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard.

title: Madagascar
plotSummary: A group of animals from the Central Park Zoo end up stranded on the island of Madagascar.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
plotSummary: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
